SELECT SUM(t.trade_price + t.change) FROM dms_tb_trade t WHERE t.STATE = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
t.type IN #codes[]#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM dms_tb_trade t WHERE t.STATE = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
t.type IN #codes[]#

SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.sup_id AS supId, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.change, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.modify_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS modifyDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS payDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.send_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.sign_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS signDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedback_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedbacked_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackedDate, t.type, IFNULL(t.score, 0), t.feedback_type AS feedbackType FROM dms_tb_trade t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
t.type IN #codes[]#
ORDER BY TRADE_ID DESC
ORDER BY $sort$ $order$, TRADE_ID DESC
LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $offset$

SELECT t.trade_id AS tradeId, t.trade_no AS tradeNo, t.sup_id AS supId, t.type, t.pay_type AS payType, t.trade_price AS tradePrice, t.change, t.cart_id AS cartId, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.modify_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS modifyDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.pay_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS payDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.send_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS sendDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.sign_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS signDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedback_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackDate, DATE_FORMAT(t.feedbacked_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS feedbackedDate FROM dms_tb_trade t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.trade_no = #tradeNo# AND t.shop_id = #shopId#
